      • chooseBox

        public int chooseBox(int i,
                     int j)
        Method that receives two numbers and verifies in which box the user is located, and returns the number of mines on the board
        pre: The box has been chosen.
        Parameters:
        i,j. - numbers that represents the position of the box that the user wants to open. i != null, j != null.
        Returns:
        numMinas - number of mines that the box has around.

      • getColumns

        public int getColumns()
        Method which returns the number of columns in the created board.
        pre: The board should has to be initialized.
        pos: Returns the number of columns.
        Returns:
        columns - number of columns related to the size of the board.

      • getBoard

        public Box[][] getBoard()
        Method which returns the game board.
        pre: The board must be initialized.
        Returns:
        board - the board of Boxes.

      • getNumberOfMines

        public int getNumberOfMines()
        Method which returns the number of mines in the generated board.
        pre: The matrix Board has to be initialized.
        pre: The array mines has to be initialized.
        Returns:
        mines - number of mines in the whole Board.
